text:
Abolghasem Sarhaddizadeh (; 1945 – July 14, 2020) was an Iranian reformist politician. He was a member of the Islamic Consultative Assembly between 1990 to 1992 and 1996 to 2004. He was Minister of Labour and Social Affairs from 1983 to 1989. Sarhaddizadeh was born in Tehran.
Sarhaddizadeh died on July 14, 2020 in Tehran, aged 75.

annotations.surface_form: Minister of Labour and Social Affairs
